RemediationStrings.Title: MDATP not installed
RemediationStrings.Description:
Your computer doesn't have installed Microsoft Defender.
Please refer to the link 'How to resolve this'.
Value discovered was: '{ActualValue}'

RemediationStrings.Title: MDATP not licensed
RemediationStrings.Description:
Your computer doesn't have a licensed Microsoft Defender installation.

RemediationStrings.Title: MDATP version too old
RemediationStrings.Description:
Your computer has installed a old Microsoft Defender version.
